q: Alassane Ouattara , the president- elect. The President of the ECOWAS Commission, Victor Gbeho , on that day made it clear in Abuja what Ecowas had in mind per the December 24 communiqu. He said, ECOWAS and AU is now saying even if there is half per cent chance of resolving the issue peacefully, we will explore it. interviewing more than 100 witnesses, the New York-based Human Rights Watch concluded that postelection violence was overwhelmingly committed by Gbagbo supporters to intimidate people living in neighborhoods that voted for the internationally recognized leader, Alassane Ouattara .
